movie.title: Out of the Blue
movie.plot: A young girl whose father is an ex-convict and whose mother is a junkie finds it difficult to conform and tries to find comfort in a quirky combination of Elvis and the punk scene.

movie.title: The Robber
movie.plot: A story based on Johann Rettenberger, an Austrian marathon runner and a bank robber.

movie.title: Paranormal Activity 4
movie.plot: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.
